price: 2. Misschien zullen degenen die ongelovig zijn wensen dat zij moslim zouden zijn.
arabic: رُّبَمَا يَوَدُّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ لَوۡ كَانُواْ مُسۡلِمِينَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: rubamā yawaddu alladhīna kafarū law kānū mus'limīna
